response.raw:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
As a senior Elementary School Teacher, I will:

1. Thoroughly review and understand all school policies and rules
2. Consistently apply policies to all students fairly and equitably
3. Clearly communicate expectations to students and parents
4. Address rule violations promptly and appropriately
5. Document incidents and interventions as required
6. Collaborate with administration on policy enforcement
7. Participate in policy review and updates when requested
8. Model adherence to rules and policies for students
9. Provide positive reinforcement for rule-following behavior
10. Maintain a safe and orderly classroom environment
11. Seek guidance from administration on complex situations
12. Support school-wide initiatives related to student conduct
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
